## CaseMatcherFor type

Helper type to extract a case matcher descriptor out of a list of descriptors

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type CaseMatcherFor<KnownMatcherDescriptors, T extends string> = Extract<KnownMatcherDescriptors, IsCaseNodeForType<T>>;
```
**References:** [IsCaseNodeForType](./case-plugin-base.iscasenodefortype.md)
